segments.text: more or less . There's just one thing bothering me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , you know I have some students studying for their master's degree . One of them tried to give me a gift that kind made me uneasy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it's an Egyptian carpet . The student came to my office the other day and brought the carpet to show his gratitude . Seeing what gift was , I was really uncomfortable . I mean it's too expensive a gift
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you refused the gift ? That's terrible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but I really can't accept such an expensive gift . I explained to him why , but he seemed really upset about it . I think he might have taken it the wrong way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: perhaps . He probably thinks you considered the gift a bribe for a higher grade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's what I am worried about . I do understand the respect attached with the gift and I am honored . But I really don't think it's proper for a student to spend a fortune on a gift for a professor .
segments.speaker: S2
